Edges-Legendary -- Male Half-Orc Legendary Adventurer
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Hardened: +1 Attribute Points (Strength or Vigor)
Skills (16 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Focus: (spi) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d6 Gambling: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Notice: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d8
Skill Notes:
Hard Of Hearing: -4 Notice (hearing)
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 22; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (11 points): Arcane Background (Druid); Command Presence; Command; Fervor; Followers; Home Ground; Iron Jaw; Nerves Of Steel; Relic; Unstoppable; Warband Hindrances: Hard Of Hearing; Poverty; Secret; Shamed Half-Orc Features: Hardened; Infravision; Outsider
Feature Notes:
Command Presence: Increased Command effects
Command: R10" Commanded gain +1 to recover from Shaken or Stunned
Followers: Has 5 soldier followers
Home Ground: 10 min concentration answers 3 questions about state of home area
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Combat
Parry: 6 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Tunic Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Knife (d6+d4 R3"); Ranseur (d6+d6 AP 1); Sap (d6+d4); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Fervor: R10" Commanded gain +1 Fighting damage
Infravision: Illumination penalties reduced by half when attacking targets that radiate heat
Iron Jaw: +2 Soak rolls/+2 Vigor vs. knockout
Nerves Of Steel: Ignores 1 points of wound penalties
Unstoppable: Takes at most 1 Wound per attack
Warband: 5 followers may take 1 addition Wound before becoming incapacitated
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druid): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Home Ground: Within home area, may spend a Benny to recover all Power Points
Relic: Possesses powerful magic item
Notes
Validation Errors: Warband Edge: Requires command feature (currently 1), sum leadership edges>=3 and followers feature (currently 1)
